author: A_Brickset_user
title: Mean Machine
review:
If I had this as a kid, I would have been a digger driver!
Just look at it, it screams power. The driver didn't even have time to shave, just because he wanted to drive this beast as soon as possible. The scoop is great an can hold loads of bricks. But it can't unload the scoop!!! But combined and exchanged with 2808 you overcome that problem. Or do wat my daughter does, just load with your hands. The back of the truck opens up and gives storage to 4 blocks or 2 duplo figs. To top everything of, they put the lego sign on the sides of the truck. It looks awesome, or as my daughter says VROOOOOOOMMMMM
